title: BRIEF-Unilever Q3 Underlying Sales Grow 2.9%, Affirms FY Sales Growth View
text:
BRIEF-Unilever Q3 Underlying Sales Grow 2.9%, Affirms FY Sales Growth View

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 11:48)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Unilever Q3 Underlying Sales Grow 2.9%, Affirms FY Sales Growth View Oct 17 (Reuters) - Unilever PLC : * 3RD QUARTER TRADING STATEMENT * FOR FULL YEAR, WE CONTINUE TO EXPECT UNDERLYING SALES GROWTH TO BE IN LOWER HALF OF OUR MULTI-YEAR 3-5% RANGE * QTRLY UNDERLYING SALES GROWTH 2.9% WITH VOLUME 1.4% AND PRICE 1.5% * QUARTERLY DIVIDEND PAYABLE IN DECEMBER 2019 EUR 0.4104 PER SHARE * FOR FULL YEAR, CONTINUE TO EXPECT IMPROVEMENT IN UNDERLYING OPERATING MARGIN THAT KEEPS US ON TRACK FOR 2020 TARGET * QTRLY TURNOVER INCREASED 5.8% WHICH INCLUDED A POSITIVE IMPACT OF 2.3% FROM CURRENCY AND 0.8% FROM ACQUISITIONS * QTRLY TURNOVER EUR 13.3 BILLION, UP 5.8% * QTRLY EMERGING MARKETS UNDERLYING SALES GROWTH 5.1% WITH VOLUME 2.2% AND PRICE 2.8% * IN EUROPE AND NORTH AMERICA GROWTH REMAINED LOW IN QUARTER * SOUTH EAST ASIAN MARKETS CONTINUED TO GROW WELL, WHILST GROWTH IN INDIA SOFTENED FURTHER AND CHINA SLOWED A LITTLE IN QUARTER * IN LATIN AMERICA ECONOMIC ENVIRONMENT "REMAINS DIFFICULT"
